reviews.text: I stayed for five nights at this Medellin hostel and could have easily stayed longer. It is a brand new operation from a young guy hailing from Miami.
reviews.title: Professional operation; friendly guests; CLEAN!

reviews.text: The hostel takes credit cards, has electronic key locks and hotel-quality linens -- all for the same price as neighboring hostels. The $5,000 COL breakfast is also a good deal -- cereal, eggs, bread, coffee and juice served on a place mat with ceramic plates.
reviews.title: Amazing...loved it! Clean and comfortable!

reviews.text: Although the courtyard of the hostel is a bit 'under construction', there are still plenty of nice spaces to sit and enjoy the fast free wifi or a beer -- tables, a nice TV area with satellite channels, and a very comfortable balcony area overlooking the Poblado streets.
reviews.title: Best hostel I have stayed in
